content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253432,"originalJapaneseLine":"なかなかやるな・・だが・・　と消えて行くケッセルリンク","translatedEnglishLine":"Not bad... but... Kessel Link disappears"},{"lineNumber":253433,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっ、逃げるのか・・（ふっ助かった）","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, is he running away... (Phew, I'm saved)"},{"lineNumber":253434,"originalJapaneseLine":"まさか、闇は私の世界　うんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"No way, 'Darkness is my world' and all that"},{"lineNumber":253435,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲が真っ暗になった、","translatedEnglishLine":"The surroundings turned pitch black,"},{"lineNumber":253436,"originalJapaneseLine":"シィル、魔法で光を出せ","translatedEnglishLine":"Syl, produce light with magic"},{"lineNumber":253437,"originalJapaneseLine":"だ、駄目です・・この闇は照らす事ができない","translatedEnglishLine":"N-no... this darkness cannot be illuminated"},{"lineNumber":253438,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253439,"originalJapaneseLine":"※　　保留です　画面が出来るのを確認してから","translatedEnglishLine":"* On hold. Will proceed after confirming the screen is ready"},{"lineNumber":253440,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中、割り込みイベント","translatedEnglishLine":"Interruption event during battle"},{"lineNumber":253441,"originalJapaneseLine":"４ターン目、無敵結界が無い時、再度　発生する","translatedEnglishLine":"On the 4th turn, if the invincible barrier is gone, the event triggers again"},{"lineNumber":253442,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253443,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス・・ちょっとまて、ランスと止める","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos... Wait a moment, stop Lance"},{"lineNumber":253444,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだうるさいぞ、だべっている余裕なんかないぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"What's this noise? There's no time to chat"},{"lineNumber":253445,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんな奴、始めてみたわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I've never seen a guy like this before."},{"lineNumber":253446,"originalJapaneseLine":"だから、なんなんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"So, what of it?"},{"lineNumber":253447,"originalJapaneseLine":"わしの効果で１度は剥がした無敵結界、もう１度発生させやがった","translatedEnglishLine":"The invincible barrier I removed once with my power has reappeared once again"},{"lineNumber":253448,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・なに","translatedEnglishLine":"...What?"},{"lineNumber":253449,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクを倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeat the demon Kessel Link"},{"lineNumber":253450,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t興奮状態のランスは、そのまま館に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"An excited Lance heads straight to the mansion"},{"lineNumber":253451,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tそしてシィルとシーラを取り戻す","translatedEnglishLine":"And retrieves Syl and Sheela"},{"lineNumber":253452,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t圧倒的な力の差、勝てない","translatedEnglishLine":"The overwhelming difference in power, cannot win"},{"lineNumber":253453,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tまた見逃されてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"Once again, let slip by"},{"lineNumber":253454,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tあれから何度もランスは負け続けた","translatedEnglishLine":"Since then, Lance has continued to lose many times"},{"lineNumber":253455,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t荒ぶるランスをリセットがビンタで止める","translatedEnglishLine":"Reset stops the furious Lance with a slap"},{"lineNumber":253456,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの元にシィルとシーラが戻ってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Syl and Sheela returned to Lance"},{"lineNumber":253457,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t二人ともランスを選んだのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Both of them chose Lance"},{"lineNumber":253458,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスは元気を取り戻し","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance regains his energy"},{"lineNumber":253459,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t新しい作戦を思いつく","translatedEnglishLine":"He comes up with a new plan"},{"lineNumber":253460,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\tランスがヒューバートに指示する","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance gives instructions to Hubert"},{"lineNumber":253461,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t\t信頼出来る女を大量を集めろ","translatedEnglishLine":"Gather a large number of trustworthy women"},{"lineNumber":253462,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tトランシルバニアの森","translatedEnglishLine":"The Transylvania forest"},{"lineNumber":253463,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tピグ、アナセル、パステルなど","translatedEnglishLine":"Pig, Anasel, Pastel, and others"},{"lineNumber":253464,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが女達を森へ逃がす","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance sends the women to escape into the forest"},{"lineNumber":253465,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ラングバウ","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Langbau"},{"lineNumber":253466,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t集められた不幸な女達が森へ運ばれていく","translatedEnglishLine":"Unfortunate women gathered are being taken into the forest"},{"lineNumber":253467,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t少し前の出来事","translatedEnglishLine":"Events from a little earlier"},{"lineNumber":253468,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Hear from Syl and Sheela about Kessel Link's weakness"},{"lineNumber":253469,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t不幸な女の子をほっておけない甘い奴","translatedEnglishLine":"A soft guy who can't leave unfortunate girls alone"},{"lineNumber":253470,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t弱点はやさしさ、そこを突く","translatedEnglishLine":"His weakness is kindness; attack there"},{"lineNumber":253471,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion"},{"lineNumber":253472,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t不幸な女の子が次々と増えていく","translatedEnglishLine":"The number of unfortunate girls keeps increasing"},{"lineNumber":253473,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tトランシルバニアの森","translatedEnglishLine":"The Transylvania forest"},{"lineNumber":253474,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t作戦は成功しつつある","translatedEnglishLine":"The plan is starting to succeed"},{"lineNumber":253475,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達は進撃を開始した","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others have begun their advance"},{"lineNumber":253476,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシィルに首輪を付けて連れ回す","translatedEnglishLine":"Put a collar on Syl and take her along"},{"lineNumber":253477,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシーラ、脱出の際の出来事を思い出す","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela recalls the events during the escape"},{"lineNumber":253478,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t夜が明けた","translatedEnglishLine":"Dawn breaks"},{"lineNumber":253479,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tケッセルリンクの屋敷に着いた","translatedEnglishLine":"They arrived at Kessel Link's mansion"},{"lineNumber":253480,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、屋敷内では送り込んだスパイにより","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, inside the mansion, spies sent earlier have"},{"lineNumber":253481,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tメイド使徒達が動けなくされていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Rendered the maid apostles immobile"},{"lineNumber":253482,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t城内のスパイが事前に","translatedEnglishLine":"The spies inside the castle beforehand"},{"lineNumber":253483,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t罠もモンスターも排除","translatedEnglishLine":"Eliminated traps and monsters"},{"lineNumber":253484,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達は順調に進む","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others advance smoothly"},{"lineNumber":253485,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t地下室、棺の部屋に到着する","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrive at the basement, the coffin room"},{"lineNumber":253486,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t昼間なのに起きている魔人ケッセルリンク","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon Kessel Link is awake, even though it's daytime"},{"lineNumber":253487,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Combat begins"},{"lineNumber":253488,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦闘中の台詞","translatedEnglishLine":"Lines during battle"},{"lineNumber":253489,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間のケッセルリンク、４ターン目","translatedEnglishLine":"Daytime Kessel Link, 4th turn"},{"lineNumber":253490,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":253491,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい、話が違うぞ。全然弱ってないじゃないか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, this isn't what I was told. He's not weak at all!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなかやるな・・だが・・　と消えて行くケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad... but... Kessel Link disappears

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、逃げるのか・・（ふっ助かった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, is he running away... (Phew, I'm saved)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、闇は私の世界　うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, 'Darkness is my world' and all that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲が真っ暗になった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The surroundings turned pitch black,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、魔法で光を出せ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl, produce light with magic

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だ、駄目です・・この闇は照らす事ができない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no... this darkness cannot be illuminated

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　保留です　画面が出来るのを確認してから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * On hold. Will proceed after confirming the screen is ready

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４ターン目、無敵結界が無い時、再度　発生する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the 4th turn, if the invincible barrier is gone, the event triggers again

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス・・ちょっとまて、ランスと止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos... Wait a moment, stop Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだうるさいぞ、だべっている余裕なんかないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's this noise? There's no time to chat

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな奴、始めてみたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen a guy like this before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、なんなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what of it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わしの効果で１度は剥がした無敵結界、もう１度発生させやがった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The invincible barrier I removed once with my power has reappeared once again

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・なに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Kessel Link

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興奮状態のランスは、そのまま館に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An excited Lance heads straight to the mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシィルとシーラを取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And retrieves Syl and Sheela

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な力の差、勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overwhelming difference in power, cannot win

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また見逃されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, let slip by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから何度もランスは負け続けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Lance has continued to lose many times

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒ぶるランスをリセットがビンタで止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset stops the furious Lance with a slap

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの元にシィルとシーラが戻ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl and Sheela returned to Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人ともランスを選んだのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of them chose Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは元気を取り戻し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance regains his energy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しい作戦を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He comes up with a new plan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがヒューバートに指示する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance gives instructions to Hubert

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信頼出来る女を大量を集めろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather a large number of trustworthy women

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグ、アナセル、パステルなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pig, Anasel, Pastel, and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが女達を森へ逃がす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance sends the women to escape into the forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Langbau

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集められた不幸な女達が森へ運ばれていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunate women gathered are being taken into the forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events from a little earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear from Syl and Sheela about Kessel Link's weakness

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な女の子をほっておけない甘い奴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soft guy who can't leave unfortunate girls alone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱点はやさしさ、そこを突く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His weakness is kindness; attack there

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な女の子が次々と増えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of unfortunate girls keeps increasing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦は成功しつつある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The plan is starting to succeed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は進撃を開始した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others have begun their advance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルに首輪を付けて連れ回す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Put a collar on Syl and take her along

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、脱出の際の出来事を思い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela recalls the events during the escape

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dawn breaks

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクの屋敷に着いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrived at Kessel Link's mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、屋敷内では送り込んだスパイにより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, inside the mansion, spies sent earlier have

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド使徒達が動けなくされていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rendered the maid apostles immobile

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内のスパイが事前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The spies inside the castle beforehand

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 罠もモンスターも排除
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eliminated traps and monsters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は順調に進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others advance smoothly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室、棺の部屋に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the basement, the coffin room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間なのに起きている魔人ケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kessel Link is awake, even though it's daytime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat begins

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lines during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間のケッセルリンク、４ターン目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daytime Kessel Link, 4th turn

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、話が違うぞ。全然弱ってないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, this isn't what I was told. He's not weak at all!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なかなかやるな・・だが・・　と消えて行くケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad... but... Kessel Link disappears

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっ、逃げるのか・・（ふっ助かった）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, is he running away... (Phew, I'm saved)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、闇は私の世界　うんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, 'Darkness is my world' and all that

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲が真っ暗になった、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The surroundings turned pitch black,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィル、魔法で光を出せ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl, produce light with magic

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だ、駄目です・・この闇は照らす事ができない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-no... this darkness cannot be illuminated

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※　　保留です　画面が出来るのを確認してから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: * On hold. Will proceed after confirming the screen is ready

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中、割り込みイベント
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Interruption event during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ４ターン目、無敵結界が無い時、再度　発生する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the 4th turn, if the invincible barrier is gone, the event triggers again

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス・・ちょっとまて、ランスと止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos... Wait a moment, stop Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだうるさいぞ、だべっている余裕なんかないぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What's this noise? There's no time to chat

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんな奴、始めてみたわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've never seen a guy like this before.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だから、なんなんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, what of it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わしの効果で１度は剥がした無敵結界、もう１度発生させやがった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The invincible barrier I removed once with my power has reappeared once again

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・なに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...What?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat the demon Kessel Link

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 興奮状態のランスは、そのまま館に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An excited Lance heads straight to the mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてシィルとシーラを取り戻す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And retrieves Syl and Sheela

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な力の差、勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The overwhelming difference in power, cannot win

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また見逃されてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once again, let slip by

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれから何度もランスは負け続けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since then, Lance has continued to lose many times

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 荒ぶるランスをリセットがビンタで止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset stops the furious Lance with a slap

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの元にシィルとシーラが戻ってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Syl and Sheela returned to Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人ともランスを選んだのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Both of them chose Lance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは元気を取り戻し
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance regains his energy

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新しい作戦を思いつく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He comes up with a new plan

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスがヒューバートに指示する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance gives instructions to Hubert

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信頼出来る女を大量を集めろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gather a large number of trustworthy women

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピグ、アナセル、パステルなど
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pig, Anasel, Pastel, and others

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが女達を森へ逃がす
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance sends the women to escape into the forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Langbau

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集められた不幸な女達が森へ運ばれていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunate women gathered are being taken into the forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し前の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events from a little earlier

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hear from Syl and Sheela about Kessel Link's weakness

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な女の子をほっておけない甘い奴
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soft guy who can't leave unfortunate girls alone

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱点はやさしさ、そこを突く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: His weakness is kindness; attack there

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ケッセルリンクの屋敷
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at Kessel Link's mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不幸な女の子が次々と増えていく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The number of unfortunate girls keeps increasing

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Transylvania forest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦は成功しつつある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The plan is starting to succeed

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は進撃を開始した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others have begun their advance

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルに首輪を付けて連れ回す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Put a collar on Syl and take her along

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ、脱出の際の出来事を思い出す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela recalls the events during the escape

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜が明けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dawn breaks

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクの屋敷に着いた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They arrived at Kessel Link's mansion

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、屋敷内では送り込んだスパイにより
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, inside the mansion, spies sent earlier have

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド使徒達が動けなくされていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rendered the maid apostles immobile

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 城内のスパイが事前に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The spies inside the castle beforehand

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 罠もモンスターも排除
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eliminated traps and monsters

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は順調に進む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others advance smoothly

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地下室、棺の部屋に到着する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at the basement, the coffin room

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間なのに起きている魔人ケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon Kessel Link is awake, even though it's daytime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Combat begins

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘中の台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lines during battle

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間のケッセルリンク、４ターン目
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daytime Kessel Link, 4th turn

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、話が違うぞ。全然弱ってないじゃないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, this isn't what I was told. He's not weak at all!
